--- title: utils keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Collection of utils." ---

Parameters parser¶

param_parser[source]

param_parser(func)

Look at params in func and return an dict of args: default

param_parser(optim.Adam)

{'lr': 0.001,
 'betas': (0.9, 0.999),
 'eps': 1e-08,
 'weight_decay': 0,
 'amsgrad': False}

Lr finder and Plot¶

lr_f[source]

lr_f(learn)

plot[source]

plot(learn, plot_all=False)

Train¶

FOC¶

train[source]

train(learn, show_graph=False)

Run fit_one_cycle with learner, params in learn.p

FC from fastai¶

train_fc[source]

train_fc(learn, show_graph=False)

Run fit_fc with learn, paramas in learn.p

FC with refactoring. Lr and MOM separated.¶

FCSchedLr[source]

FCSchedLr(learn, tot_epochs:int=1, lr:float=0.004, start_pct:float=0.72, lr_final_div=None, curve='cosine')

refactored version of FCFit from fastai, only Lr

FCSchedMom[source]

FCSchedMom(learn, tot_epochs:int=1, moms:Union[float, Collection[float]]=(0.95, 0.999), start_pct:float=0.72, shift=0.1, curve='cosine')

refactored version of FCFit from fastai, only Lr

fc_lr_mom[source]

fc_lr_mom(learn:Learner, tot_epochs:int=1, lr:float=slice(None, 0.003, None), moms=False, start_pct:float=0.72, wd:float=None, lr_final_div=None, shift=0.1, callbacks:Optional[Collection[Callback]]=None)

Fit a model with Flat Cosine Annealing

fc[source]

fc(learn, show_graph=False)

Run fc scheduled lr, mom, with learn, paramas in learn.p

end¶
